text: Hathersage F.C. is an English association football club from Hathersage, Derbyshire. They play in the Hope Valley Amateur League. ==History== They entered the FA Amateur Cup in 1908, from 1912 to 1922 and from 1928 to 1929. and won the Sheffield Amateur League in 1907 and 1920. ==References== Category:Sheffield Amateur League Category:Football clubs in Derbyshire Category:Football clubs in England Category:Hope Valley Amateur League
title: Hathersage F.C.
